name: WordPress – Anti Steal Content
author: Anton A Belogorodtstev

sections.description:
• Author: Anton A. Belogorodtsev
  • Project URI: https://fe-nix.ru/wp-asc.html

When somebody copy information from your website, the plugin will add to the copied text of the link source.
When using the plug-in greatly increasing the number of backlinks.

License
sections.installation:
1. Upload directory wp-asc to the /wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
What I would give it?

This will give a huge influx of backlinks to your website. You did not know how much your writing Comments on blogs and forums.
